value.title: Implement row-level security
value.excerpt: Row-level security (RLS) allows you to create a single or a set of reports that targets data for a specific user. In this module, you will learn how to implement RLS by using either a static or dynamic method and how Microsoft Power BI simplifies testing RLS in Power BI Desktop and Power BI service.

value.title: Sales Prediction Model with Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Create a Linear Regression Model with Python and Power BI. Use What IF parameters in Power BI to give the user dynamic investment inputs.   Contact me on LinkedIn  https://www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns.  I learnt this by watching Microsoft Power BI webinar with Chris Webb: https://info.microsoft.com/CO-PowerBI-WBNR-FY16-06Jun-21-Amazing-Things-with-Power-BI-Registration.html?Is=Website

CALCULATETABLE allows you to create virtual tables that you can then filter using multiple conditions and use that table to make further calculations.   What is the difference between CALCULATETABLE and CALCULATE?  The first one

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too. value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the On-Premises Data Gateway. What is it exactly? This can be used with more than just Power BI. This includes PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Azure Analysis Services and more. The entire Power Platform!   If you found this video helpful, we have a free cheat sheet for you for more
